refnamediv.refpurpose: This function fits an AR (p)-model with Yule-Walker estimates.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: a = aryule (x, p) [a, v] = aryule (x, p) [a, v, k] = aryule (x, p)

listitem.para: vector of real or complex numbers, length > 2

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function fits an AR (p)-model with Yule-Walker estimates. The first argument is the data vector which is to be estimated. Output variable a gives the AR coefficients, v gives the variance of the white noise and k gives the reflection coefficients to be used in the lattice filter.
